absolute.description: Apply the position: absolute style to the component.
absolute.description_zh: 应用 position: absolute 样式到组件.

border.description: Apply a border style to the component.

collapse.description: Morphs the component into a collapsed state, reducing its maximum width.
collapse.description_zh: 将组件变形为折叠状态，从而减小其最大宽度。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整组件使用的垂直高度。

elevation.description: The elevation of the component is acceptable from 0 to 24. You can read more on the Elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 组件的海拔可接受 0 到 24 之间的值。你可以在 elevation page 浏览更多信息。

extended.description: Use this prop to increase the height of the toolbar without the need to use the extension slot to add content. It can be used with the extension-height property, as well as other properties that affect the height of the toolbar, such as prominent, dense, etc., except height.
extended.description_zh: 使用此道具可以增加工具栏的高度，而 不需要 使用 extension 插槽来添加内容。可以与 extension-height 属性，以及其他会影响工具栏高度的其他属性，例如 prominent, dense 等配合使用，height 除外。

extension-height.description: Designate an explicit height for the extension slot.
extension-height.description_zh: 指定扩展槽的显式高度。

floating.description: Apply display: inline-flex to the component.
floating.description_zh: 将 display: inline-flex 应用于组件。

height.description: Specify a specific height for the toolbar. Overrides the height applied by other props, e.g. prominent, dense, extended.
height.description_zh: 指定工具栏的特定高度。覆盖其他 props 所施加的高度，例如 prominent, dense, extended。

image.description: Specify V-IMG as the component background.
image.description_zh: 指定 v-img 作为组件背景。

location.description: Aligns the component towards the top or bottom.
location.description_zh: 将元件朝向顶部或底部对齐。

:v-model.description: The value of the component v-mode. If the component supports variants, the default is an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件 v-mode 的值。如果组件支持多属性，默认为空数组。

name.description: Assign a specific name for layout registration.
name.description_zh: 为布局注册指定特定名称。

order.description: Adjust the order of the component in relation to its registration order.
order.description_zh: 根据组件的注册顺序调整组件的顺序。

rounded.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
rounded.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面 获取更多有关信息

scroll-behavior3.2.0 版本的新特色.description: Specify an action to take when the scroll position of scroll-target reaches scroll-threshold. Accepts any combination of hide, inverted, collapse, elevate, and fade-image. Multiple values can be used, separated by a space.
scroll-behavior3.2.0 版本的新特色.description_zh: 指定当 scroll-target 的滚动位置达到 scroll-threshold 时要执行的操作。接受隐藏、反转、折叠、提升和淡入淡出图像的任意组合。可以使用多个值，用空格分隔。

scroll-target.description: The element to target for scrolling events. Uses window by default.
scroll-target.description_zh: 滚动事件的目标元素。默认使用窗口。

scroll-threshold.description: The amount of scroll distance down before scroll-behavior activates.
scroll-threshold.description_zh: 在激活滚动行为之前向下滚动距离的量。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

title.description: Specify a title text for the component.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: An event that is raised when a component's model-value changes.
events.description_zh: 当组件的 model-value 更改时引发的事件。

slots.name: append
slots.description: Adds an item inside the input and after input content.
slots.description_zh: 在输入内容内部和之后添加一个项目。

slots.name: extension
slots.description: Slot positioned directly under the main content of the toolbar. Height of this slot can be set explicitly with the extension-height prop.
slots.description_zh: 插槽位于工具栏主要内容的正下方。可以使用 extension-height 属性显式设置此插槽的高度。

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Adds an item outside the input and before input content.
slots.description_zh: 在输入内容之外和输入内容之前添加一个项目。

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for the component’s title content.
